product_name: The North Face Passpine Shell Jacket - Women's
long_description: The women's Passpine jacket by The North Face is a light, sleek and stylish shell built for no-nonsense windproof, waterproof protection on the mountain, keeping you dry all season long. 2.5-layer HyVent(R) jacket is waterproof, windproof and breathable; seams are sealed to prevent moisture from seeping through. FlashDry(TM) microporous particles are incorporated directly into the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Fully adjustable, removable hood on the Passpine jacket ensures a weather-blocking, personalized fit. Adjustable hem and rip-and-stick wrist cuffs help seal out cold air and retain valuable warmth; underarm vents let you control airflow and your comfort. Zip handwarmer pockets; wrist pocket with goggles cloth; internal media pocket; internal goggles pocket. Adjustable powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out; snaps let you integrate the powder skirt with compatible pants by The North Face (sold separately).
short_description: The women's Passpine jacket by The North Face is a light, sleek and stylish shell built for no-nonsense windproof, waterproof protection on the mountain, keeping you dry all season long.
